category.label: wizbongre/EclipseUI5/
category.description: UI5 (SAPUI5 & OpenUI5) Templates for Eclipse - provided at https://github.com/wizbongre/EclipseUI5

item.label: Basic UI5 Desktop index.html
item.description:
A standard UI5 index.html file, with placeholders for sap-ui-core.js, libs & theme; plus basic linking to other standard files such as css, .js, etc. Can be used as a quickstart for a new UI5 desktop* project.
* For a mobile project, use either the UI5 mobile specific snippet or change the sap-ui-libs used.
item.content:
<!DOCTYPE HTML> <html> <head> <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
<script src="${sap-ui-core}" id="sap-ui-bootstrap" data-sap-ui-libs="${sap-ui-libs}" data-sap-ui-theme="${sap-ui-theme}"> </script>
<!-- Custom Styles --> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="${Custom CSS}" />
<!-- Custom Util JavaScript --> <script type="text/javascript" src="${Custom Util JS}"></script>
<!-- all App JavaScript Code starts in ${Application JS}, no Code in HTML --> <script type="text/javascript" src="${Application JS}"></script>
<title>${Window Title}</title> </head>
<body class="sapUiBody" id="${Content ID}"> </body> </html>

variable.name: sap-ui-core
variable.description: Source for standard UI5 core libraries

variable.name: Custom Util JS
variable.description: Link to custom util JS file

variable.name: Content ID
variable.description: ID of the main content placeholder

item.label: Basic UI5 Mobile index.html
item.description:
A standard UI5 index.html file, with placeholders for sap-ui-core.js, libs & theme; plus basic linking to other standard files such as css, .js, etc. Can be used as a quickstart for a new UI5 mobile* project.
* For a desktop project, use either the UI5 desktop specific snippet or change the sap-ui-libs used.
item.content:
<!DOCTYPE HTML> <html> <head> <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
<script src="${sap-ui-core}" id="sap-ui-bootstrap" data-sap-ui-libs="${sap-ui-libs}" data-sap-ui-theme="${sap-ui-theme}" data-sap-ui-xx-bindingSyntax="complex"> </script>
<!-- Custom Styles --> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="${Custom CSS}" />
<!-- Custom Util JavaScript --> <script type="text/javascript" src="${Custom Util JS}"></script>
<!-- all App JavaScript Code starts in ${Application JS}, no Code in HTML --> <script type="text/javascript" src="${Application JS}"></script>
<title>${Window Title}</title> </head>
<body class="sapUiBody" id="${Content ID}"> </body> </html>

variable.name: sap-ui-core
variable.description: Source for standard UI5 core libraries

variable.name: Custom Util JS
variable.description: Link to custom util JS file

variable.name: Content ID
variable.description: ID of the main content placeholder
